defs: a pole planted at the middle of a threshing floor.

a multitude of threshing floor.

its inhabitant.

the seed of this plant, contains such alkaloids as morphine, codeine, and papaverine, and is used as an intoxicant and medicinally to relieve pain and produce sleep; opium.

a regular series of specific physical exercise for the purpose of training or developing the body; military or physical training in marching, etc.; the process involved.

the act of cutting, severing or seperating (from the whole); a cutting.
the act or process of removing the testicles of a bull, ram, etc.; emasculation; castration.

a graft - a) a shoot or bud of one plant inserted or to be inserted into the stem or trunk of another, where it continues to grow, becoming a permanent part; scion b) the act or process of inserting such a bud or shoot; grafting.
the condition of being subject to pain, grief, trouble, etc.; misery.
a disease, as the one that spreads rapidly.
a situation that warrants earnest or immediate attention; seriousness; graveness.

hard to bear, tolerate or endure; strong; vehement.
